page.title: Safety & Health
page.subtitle: Facts instead of Myths: A scientific look at hepatotoxicity, side effects, and safe consumption.

konsens.title: Current Scientific Consensus
konsens.intro: According to comprehensive analyses by WHO, EMA, and independent researchers:
points: Traditionally prepared Kava from noble varieties is safe when used properly
Severe liver damage is extremely rare (estimated incidence: 1 in 60,000 to 1 in 1,000,000)
The EU ban of 2002 was deemed disproportionate by German courts
Risks primarily arise from quality deficiencies, incorrect plant parts, or mixed consumption

kapitel.title: Chapter Overview: Safety in Detail
kapitel.intro: This chapter provides a comprehensive, scientifically grounded analysis of all safety-related aspects of Kava. Click on the subpages for detailed information:

subpages.title: Liver Safety & Hepatotoxicity
subpages.description: The scientific truth about the ban of 2002, WHO and EMA assessments, risk factors, and practical recommendations.

subpages.title: Interactions with Medications
subpages.description: Kavalactones inhibit CYP450 enzymes: Complete overview of high-risk combinations and moderate interactions.

subpages.title: Contraindications
subpages.description: When Kava should not be used: Absolute and relative contraindications for safe handling.

dosierung.title: Dosage Recommendations
dosierung.intro: The optimal dose depends heavily on individual tolerance ("Reverse Tolerance") and the Kava variety. Always start with lower doses.

nebenwirkungen.title: Possible Side Effects
nebenwirkungen.intro: Although Kava is safe when used properly, side effects can occur, especially with excessive consumption.

items.label: Nausea:
items.value: With high doses on an empty stomach

checkliste.title: Safety Checklist
items: Use only Noble Kava from trusted sources
Use only root/rhizome – no leaves or stems

warning.title: Pay Attention to Warning Signs
warning.text: If you notice yellowing of the skin/eyes, dark urine, light-colored stool, or unusual fatigue, immediately stop consumption and consult a doctor.
